title: User login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user with correct username and password can successfully log in and is redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on their role.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username and password
Submit the login form
Check that login is successful
Verify user is redirected to Dashboard Gerente if role is Gerente Geral
Verify user is redirected to Dashboard Chefe if role is Chefe de Equipe

title: User login with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect username or password and an appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username or password
Submit the login form
Check that login is rejected
Verify an error message about invalid credentials is shown

title: Access control based on user roles
description: Verify that access to routes and functionalities is properly restricted based on user role (Gerente Geral or Chefe de Equipe).

steps.description: Login as Gerente Geral
Attempt to access user management and collaborator management modules
Verify access is granted to all administrative features
Logout and login as Chefe de Equipe
Attempt to access user management and collaborator management modules
Verify access is denied and UI elements are hidden or unclickable

title: Create user individually with valid data
description: Verify that Gerente Geral can create individual users with valid data and that new users appear in the user list.

steps.description: Login as Gerente Geral
Navigate to Gestão de Usuários
Fill the user creation form with valid inputs including optional email as 'N/A' or blank
Submit the form
Verify the user is created successfully
Verify the user appears in the user listing

title: Create users in bulk with valid inputs
description: Verify that Gerente Geral can create multiple users in a single batch using the bulk form with valid data and errors are handled gracefully.

steps.description: Login as Gerente Geral
Navigate to bulk user creation form
Input multiple user records in textarea with correct format
Submit the bulk creation form
Verify all valid users are created
Verify errors for invalid user entries are shown without aborting entire batch

title: Edit existing user with valid data including empty email
description: Verify that Gerente Geral can edit user data and can save updates even when email field is blank or set as 'N/A'.

steps.description: Login as Gerente Geral
Navigate to user list and choose a user to edit
Modify user data leaving email blank or 'N/A'
Submit the edit form
Verify changes are saved successfully
Verify no validation errors occur due to email field

title: Delete a user with sufficient permissions
description: Verify that Gerente Geral can delete users and that deleted users are removed from the listing.

steps.description: Login as Gerente Geral
Navigate to user management and select a user
Perform delete operation
Verify user is removed from the list
Verify deletion is logged/audited

title: Create and edit collaborators individually and in batch
description: Verify that Gerente Geral can add, edit and remove collaborators (efetivo) individually or in batch, with proper linkage to base and team.

steps.description: Login as Gerente Geral
Navigate to Gestão de Efetivo
Add a collaborator with valid data
Verify collaborator is added and displayed correctly
Add multiple collaborators in batch via textarea
Verify all valid collaborators are added
Edit a collaborator's details
Verify changes are persisted
Remove a collaborator
Verify collaborator is deleted

title: Submit operational indicator forms with valid data
description: Verify that users, according to their roles, can submit forms for all 14 indicators with correct validations and successful data insertion without overwriting previous entries.

steps.description: Login as Chefe de Equipe or Gerente Geral
Navigate to indicators form (e.g., TAF, Prova Teórica, Ocorrências Aeronáuticas)
Fill the form with valid data including formatted dates and masked time inputs
Submit the form
Verify data is saved successfully as a new record (INSERT)
Verify old entries remain unchanged and multiple entries per day are allowed

title: Reject indicator form submission with invalid or missing data
description: Verify that form validation prevents submission of indicators with missing mandatory fields, invalid formats or logical errors.

steps.description: Navigate to any indicator form
Input invalid data such as missing required fields or wrong date formats
Attempt to submit the form
Verify submission is blocked
Verify validation error messages are displayed appropriately

title: Filtering analytics data with valid parameters
description: Verify that users can apply filters (base, team, period, collaborator, occurrence type) in the analytics dashboard and that data respects the 12-month limit and returns relevant KPIs and charts.

steps.description: Login as authorized user
Navigate to Dashboard Analytics
Select filters: base, team, period (≤12 months), collaborator, occurrence type
Apply filters
Verify data displayed matches selected filters
Verify charts render with correct chronological order, legends, and tooltips

title: Reject analytics filter if date interval exceeds 12 months
description: Verify that the system prevents users from querying analytics data over periods longer than 12 months with appropriate error messaging.

steps.description: Navigate to Dashboard Analytics
Select filter with period longer than 12 months
Attempt to apply filters
Verify system rejects the query
Verify user sees an error or warning about date interval limit

title: Ensure pagination server-side works in historical data
description: Verify that historical entries show 20 records per page with navigation controls, and that scroll resets to top when switching pages.

steps.description: Navigate to Histórico de Lançamentos
Verify only 20 records are visible per page
Use pagination controls to navigate to next and previous pages
Verify scrolling resets to top
Use filters to reduce result set
Verify pagination updates accordingly

title: Verify permission based CRUD operations on historical data
description: Ensure users cannot edit or delete historical entries beyond their role permissions and proper messages are displayed upon denial.

steps.description: Login as Chefe de Equipe
Attempt to edit or delete historical entries outside permitted scope
Verify operation is denied
Verify appropriate error message is displayed

title: Compliance monitoring alerts for inactive users and non-compliant bases
description: Verify that the monitoring module correctly identifies non-compliance and inactive users and displays clear visual alerts according to compliance rules.

steps.description: Access Monitoramento de Aderência module
Check indicator statuses for bases from groups A, B, and C
Verify symbols and colors representing compliance are displayed correctly
Verify alerts for inactive users are shown as per rules

title: User profile update including password change
description: Verify users can edit their profile data and successfully change their password with former password confirmation and validation.

steps.description: Login as any user
Navigate to Settings
Edit profile data and submit changes
Verify profile updates are saved
Attempt password change with incorrect current password
Verify rejection and error shown
Attempt password change with valid current and new password
Verify password updated successfully

title: Submit and view user feedbacks with proper permission and sorting
description: Verify that users can submit feedback, and support staff can access feedback list filtered and sorted with correct statuses and types.

steps.description: Login as user
Navigate to feedback submission form
Submit feedback with proper type and details
Verify feedback is saved and appears in user's feedback list
Login as support user with permission
Access feedback list
Verify feedbacks are listed in order and filtering by status and type works correctly

title: Validate data integrity and security with RLS policies
description: Verify that Row Level Security (RLS) policies prevent access or modification of data outside user’s permitted base or team and that audit logs capture access attempts.

steps.description: Login as user with access to base A and team X
Attempt to read and modify data of base B or other teams
Verify access is denied
Verify appropriate error message is displayed
Check audit logs for recorded attempts

title: Dashboard UI rendering with correct theming and components
description: Verify that dashboards render with the correct color scheme (orange #fc4d00), shadow styling, and responsive layouts on multiple device sizes, and that reusable UI components behave as expected.

steps.description: Login and navigate to Dashboards Gerente Geral and Chefe de Equipe
Verify theme colors match specification (#fc4d00 orange, shadows, layouts)
Verify UI components like buttons, cards, inputs render correctly
Resize browser or access via mobile viewport
Verify responsive layout adapts properly

title: Edge function operations for administrative tasks without session impact
description: Verify that administrative CRUD operations on users and collaborators executed via Edge Functions do not terminate or affect current administrator sessions and are reflected in the system correctly.

steps.description: Login as Gerente Geral (administrator)
Perform create, update and delete operations on users and collaborators
Verify operations complete successfully via Edge Functions
Verify administrator session remains active without logout
Verify changes immediately reflect in UI

title: Database query performance under load with indices
description: Verify that analytics queries return results within 2 seconds for datasets containing 100,000+ records using B-Tree and GIN indices and that JSONB column querying is optimized.

steps.description: Load database with simulated large dataset (100k+ records)
Execute typical analytics queries with filters
Verify queries complete within 2 seconds
Verify only necessary columns are queried to reduce memory and traffic

title: Verify multi-entry per day feature for indicators
description: Confirm that the system allows multiple insertions for the same indicator and date without overwriting previous entries and aggregates data accurately in reports.

steps.description: Submit multiple entries for the same day for an indicator
Verify multiple records are stored independently
Generate reports or dashboards aggregating that data
Verify aggregation and KPIs include all entries

title: Validation of dynamic occurrence type filters in analytics
description: Verify that filters for occurrence type related to Aeronáutica and Não Aeronáutica correctly filter and display data in the analytics dashboard.

steps.description: Access analytics filters
Select occurrence type Aeronáutica
Verify displayed data corresponds only to Aeronáutica occurrences
Change filter to Não Aeronáutica
Verify displayed data corresponds only to Não Aeronáutica occurrences

title: Audit trail verification for data queries and modifications
description: Verify that all data queries and modification actions are logged in audit tables or logs to guarantee data integrity and security.

steps.description: Perform read and write operations on indicator data, users, and collaborators
Verify each operation is recorded in audit logs with user, timestamp, and action details

title: Error boundary component captures and handles UI errors
description: Verify that the React ErrorBoundary component properly catches rendering errors within dashboards and forms and displays an error UI without crashing the entire app.

steps.description: Introduce a runtime error in a child component (simulate) of a dashboard or form
Verify ErrorBoundary catches the error
Verify that a friendly error message or fallback UI is displayed instead of a blank or broken page
